name: Mutated Slappers
description:
Become the strongest mutated by slaying your enemies in this world where slapping is the ultimate and only way to attack!

Three fighting sections each of them blocked by a door that only opens once you activate all associated levers. Each section having one more lever to find.

You can always come back and de-activate a lever to make enemies start respawning again.

Controls :
WASD - Move
Mouse - Camera
Left click - Slap
E/F - Interact

This is a sumbit for the Discord Game Jam #5 - Theme : Mutation

Submitted with the help of : https://mathbourque.itch.io/
